tree_cowalk.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 ! ===========================================
00002 !
00003 !           TREE_WALK
00004 !
00005 !   $ Revision: 1.19 $
00006 !
00007 !   Perform tree walk for all local particles
00008 !
00009 !  Fully collective version: multipole info exchanged en masse for each pass (particle block)
00010 !
00011 !  Structure:
00012 !
00013 !    while (any particle still active) do
00014 !
00015 !      while (any particle not finished walk) do
00016 !
00017 !         if (MAC OK) 
00018 !            put node on interaction list
00019 !         else if (MAC not OK and local)
00020 !            resolve node
00021 !         else 
00022 !            put node on defer list
00023 !         endif
00024 !
00025 !      end while
00026 !      
00027 !      process requests for non-local nodes
00028 !      insert new children into local tree (htable)
00029 !      copy defer list -> new walk list
00030 !      count remaining active particles
00031 !
00032 !    end while
00033 !
00034 ! ===========================================
00035 
00036 subroutine tree_walkc(pshort,npshort, pass,theta,itime,mac,twalk,tfetch)
00037 
00038   use treevars
00039   use tree_utils
00040   use utils
00041   implicit none
00042   include 'mpif.h'
00043 
00044   real, intent(in) :: theta
00045   integer, intent(in) :: npshort,itime
00046   integer, intent(in) :: pshort(npshort)
00047   integer, intent(in) :: mac
00048   ! integer, intent(out) :: nodelist(nintm, npshort)
00049   integer :: npackm   ! Max # children shipped
00050   integer :: nchild_shipm
00051   real :: twalk, tfetch, tw1, tw2, tc1, tf1, tf2
00052 
00053   ! Key arrays (64-bit)
00054 
00055   integer*8,  dimension(npshort) :: walk_key, walk_last 
00056   integer*8, dimension(maxaddress)  :: fetch_key, work_key, request_key
00057   integer*8, dimension(8) :: sub_key, key_child, child_sub, next_child
00058   integer*8, dimension(nintmax,npshort) :: defer_list, walk_list
00059   integer*8, dimension(maxaddress) :: last_child   ! List of 'last' children fetched from remote PEs
00060 
00061   integer, dimension(npshort) :: plist
00062 
00063   integer ::  walk_addr, walk_node, entry_next 
00064   integer, dimension(npshort) :: nlocal, ndefer,  nwalk, defer_ctr
00065 
00066 
00067   integer, dimension(maxaddress) ::  request_owner, fetch_owner, sort_owner, indx
00068   integer, dimension(8) :: addr_child, node_child, leaves_child, byte_child
00069 
00070   real, dimension(0:nlev) :: boxlength2
00071   logical, dimension(npshort) :: finished, requested
00072   integer :: hops(21) ! array to control max # iterations in single traversal 
00073   integer, dimension(num_pe) ::   nactives
00074   integer, dimension(0:num_pe-1) :: nfetches, &              ! # remote keys to fetch
00075        nrequests, &           ! # keys requested from elsewhere
00076        sstrides,  rstrides,  &  ! fence posts for fetch/request lists
00077        istart, ic_start, &     ! # fenceposts
00078        nplace,&                ! # children (new entries) to place in table
00079        nchild_ship       ! # children shipped to others
00080 
00081   ! Key working vars
00082   integer*8 :: node_key, add_key, walk_next, kchild, kparent, search_key,  nxchild
00083   integer*8 :: recv_key, recv_parent, recv_next
00084   integer :: recv_leaves,recv_byte, recv_count
00085 
00086   integer*8 :: ship_key, ship_parent, ship_next
00087   integer :: ship_leaves, ship_byte, ship_count, ship_node, addr_parent, ship_address
00088 
00089   integer :: i, j, k, ic, ipe, iwait, inner_pass, nhops          ! loop counters
00090   integer :: p,pass, ipost
00091   integer :: nnew, newrequest, nreqs, i1, i2, ioff, ipack
00092   integer :: nchild, newleaf, newtwig, nactive, maxactive, ntraversals, own
00093   integer :: ic1, ic2, ihand
00094   integer ::  nchild_ship_sum, nplace_sum  ! Local # total ships and fetches
00095   integer, save ::  sum_nhops, sum_inner_pass, sum_nhops_old=0, sum_inner_old=0
00096   integer :: nfetch_sum, nreqs_sum
00097 
00098   integer ::  bchild, nodchild, lchild, hashaddr, nlast_child, cbyte
00099   integer :: max_nplace, max_pack
00100   real :: dum=0.,sbox, theta2, theta2_ion, dx, dy, dz, s2, dist2
00101 
00102   ! stuff for tree-patch after traversals complete
00103   integer ::  node_addr, parent_addr, parent_node, child_byte
00104   integer :: jmatch(1)
00105   logical :: resolved, keymatch(8), emulate_blocking=.false.
00106   logical :: ignore, mac_ok, dummies=.false.
00107 
00108   integer :: nrest, ndef
00109   integer :: ierr, nbuf, status(MPI_STATUS_SIZE)
00110   integer :: tag1=40, iofile,ndelay
00111 
00112   integer :: key2addr        ! Mapping function to get hash table address from key
00113 
00114   integer*8 :: next_node   ! Function to get next node key for local tree walk
00115 
00116 
00117   !
00118   twalk=0.
00119   tfetch=0.
00120 !  iofile = ipefile
00121   iofile = 6
00122   ndelay=1000000
00123   npackm = maxaddress
00124   nchild_shipm = maxaddress
00125 !  walk_debug = .true.
00126   ! ipefile = 6
00127   if (walk_debug .or. walk_summary) write(ipefile,'(/2(a,i6))') '*** TREE WALK (CO, ND) for timestep ',itime,' pass ',pass
00128   if (me.eq.0 .and. walk_summary) write(*,'(2(a,i6))') 'LPEPC | TREE WALK (CO, ND) for timestep ',itime,' pass ',pass
00129 
00130   sbox = boxsize
00131 
00132 
00133   theta2 = theta**2               ! Clumping parameter**2 for MAC
00134   !  theta2_ion = min(1.0,2*theta2)  ! Ion MAC 50% larger than electron MAC
00135   theta2_ion=theta2
00136   boxlength2(0)=sbox**2
00137   do i=1,nlev
00138      boxlength2(i) =  boxlength2(i-1)/4.  ! Preprocessed box sizes for each level
00139   end do
00140 
00141   walk_key(1:npshort) = 1                    ! initial walk list starts at root
00142   nwalk(1:npshort) = 0   ! # keys on deferred list
00143   defer_ctr(1:npshort) = 1   ! Deferral counter
00144   nlist = npshort                 ! Inner loop list length
00145   plist(1:npshort) = (/ (i,i=1,npshort) /)       ! initial local particle indices 
00146   nterm = 0
00147   nactive = npshort
00148 
00149   !  Find global max active particles - necessary if some PEs enter walk on dummy pass
00150 
00151 !  call MPI_BARRIER( MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr )   ! Wait for other PEs to catch up
00152 
00153   call MPI_ALLGATHER( nactive, 1, MPI_INTEGER, nactives, 1, MPI_INTEGER, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr )
00154 
00155   maxactive = maxval(nactives)
00156 
00157   ntraversals = 0
00158   nlast_child = 0
00159   sum_nhops = 0
00160   sum_inner_pass = 0
00161   if (sum_nhops_old < 0) then
00162      hops(1) = sum_nhops_old*0.9 
00163      hops(2:4) = hops(1:3)*0.2
00164      hops(5:21) = 2**30
00165   else
00166      hops = 2**30    ! First time round set infinite - finish all traversals
00167      !     hops(1) = 500
00168   endif
00169 
00170   do while (maxactive > 0)        ! Outer loop over 'active' traversals
00171 
00172      !POMP$ INST BEGIN(walk_local)
00173 
00174      call cputime(tw1)
00175      ntraversals = ntraversals + 1  ! # Tree-walks
00176      if (walk_summary .and. me==0) write(iofile,'(a,i6)') 'WALK-CO: Start of traversal ',ntraversals
00177      !     if (walk_debug) write(*,'(a,i6)') 'Start of traversal ',ntraversals
00178 
00179      finished(1:nlist) = .false.  ! label all particles not finished
00180      ndefer(1:npshort) = 0          ! Zero # deferrals (absolute particle number)
00181 
00182      nfetch_sum = 0                   ! Total number of requests for nonlocal keys
00183      nplace = 0                   ! Total # non-local children to be fetched
00184      newleaf = 0
00185      newtwig = 0                  ! local bookkeeping
00186      inner_pass = 0
00187      nhops = 0
00188 
00189 
00190      do while (nlist>0 .and. nhops <= hops(ntraversals) )        ! Inner loop - single hop in tree walk
00191         inner_pass = inner_pass+1        ! statistics
00192         nhops = nhops + nlist
00193         sum_nhops = sum_nhops + nlist
00194         sum_inner_pass = sum_inner_pass + 1
00195 
00196         do i=1,nlist
00197            p = plist(i)  ! particle index
00198            walk_addr =  key2addr( walk_key(i),'CO-WALK: local ' )     ! get htable address
00199            walk_node = htable( walk_addr )%node             ! Walk node index - points to multipole moments  
00200            walk_next = htable( walk_addr )%next             ! Next node pointer 
00201 
00202            cbyte = htable( walk_addr )%childcode        ! Children byte-code
00203 
00204 
00205            ! children of local/non-local parents already fetched: HERE flag
00206 
00207 
00208            dx = x( pshort(p) ) - xcoc( walk_node )      ! Separations
00209            dy = y( pshort(p) ) - ycoc( walk_node )
00210            dz = z( pshort(p) ) - zcoc( walk_node )
00211 
00212            s2 = boxlength2( node_level(walk_node) )
00213            dist2 = theta2*(dx**2+dy**2+dz**2)
00214            mac_ok = ( s2 < dist2 .and. walk_key(i)>1 )     ! Preprocess MAC - reject root node
00215 
00216            ! set ignore flag if leaf node corresponds to particle itself (number in pshort)
00217            ignore =  ( pshort(p) == htable( walk_addr )%node )
00218 
00219            ! Wakefield QSA mac condition: prevent forward transmission of pw info
00220            if (mac==5) ignore = (ignore .or. dx<0) 
00221 
00222            add_key = walk_key(i)                                ! Remember current key
00223 
00224            ! Possible courses of action:
00225 
00226 
00227            ! 1) MAC test OK, so put cell on interaction list and find next node for tree walk
00228 
00229            if ( (mac_ok .or. walk_node >0) .and. .not.ignore) then
00230               walk_key(i) = walk_next
00231               entry_next = nterm(p) + 1
00232 !              intlist( entry_next, p ) = add_key      ! Augment interaction list - only need keys for diagnosis
00233               nodelist( entry_next, p ) = walk_node   ! Node number for sum_force
00234               nterm(p) = entry_next
00235 
00236 
00237               ! 2) MAC fails at node for which children present, so resolve cell & put 1st child on walk_list
00238 
00239            else  if ( .not.mac_ok .and. walk_node < 0 .and. btest(cbyte,9) ) then
00240               ! if local put 1st child node on walk_list
00241               walk_key(i) = first_child( walk_node )
00242 
00243 
00244               ! 3) MAC fails at node for which children _absent_, so put node on REQUEST list (flag with add=2)
00245 
00246            else if ( .not.mac_ok .and. walk_node < 0 .and.  .not. btest(cbyte,9) ) then
00247               walk_key(i) = walk_next  ! Continue with walk for now
00248               ndefer(p) = ndefer(p) + 1
00249               defer_list( ndefer( p), p ) = add_key  ! Deferred list of nodes to search, pending request
00250               ! for data from nonlocal PEs
00251               if (.not. BTEST( htable(walk_addr)%childcode, 8 ) ) then  ! Check if node already requested
00252                  nfetch_sum = nfetch_sum + 1
00253 
00254                  fetch_key(nfetch_sum) = add_key       ! New request key
00255                  own = htable( walk_addr )%owner           ! Owner 
00256                  fetch_owner(nfetch_sum) = own
00257                  nplace(own) = nplace(own) + n_children(walk_node)     ! Total # children to be fetched from remote PEs
00258                  ! and to be inserted into local tree
00259                  htable(walk_addr)%childcode   =  IBSET( htable(walk_addr)%childcode, 8 ) ! Set requested flag
00260 
00261               endif
00262 
00263               ! 1) particle and leaf node identical, so skip
00264 
00265            else
00266               walk_key(i) = walk_next
00267 
00268            endif
00269 
00270 
00271            ! Trap condition for last of nonlocal children - fetch next deferred node from walk_list
00272            if (walk_key(i) == -1 )  then       
00273               defer_ctr(p) = defer_ctr(p) + 1
00274               walk_key(i) = walk_list (defer_ctr(p),p ) ! Select next deferred node from walk list for particle plist(i)
00275            endif
00276 
00277            walk_last(p) = walk_key(i)  ! Store last reached in traversal
00278 
00279 
00280            ! Check for completed traversals
00281            if ( walk_key(i) == 1 )  then  ! Reached root  
00282               finished(i) = .true.    ! Flag particles whose local walks are complete
00283               defer_ctr(p) = defer_ctr(p) + 1
00284 
00285            else 
00286               finished(i) = .false. 
00287            endif
00288         end do
00289 
00290         !        nnew = count( mask = .not.finished(1:nlist) )            ! Count remaining particles
00291 
00292         !        plist(1:nnew) =  pack( plist(1:nlist), mask = .not.finished(1:nlist) )    ! Compress particle index list
00293         !        walk_key(1:nnew) =  pack( walk_key(1:nlist), mask = .not.finished(1:nlist) )       ! Compress walk lists etc.
00294         nnew=0
00295         do i=1,nlist
00296            if (.not.finished(i)) then
00297               nnew=nnew+1
00298               plist(nnew) = plist(i)
00299               walk_key(nnew) = walk_key(i)
00300            endif
00301         end do
00302 
00303         nlist = nnew
00304 
00305      end do   ! END DO_WHILE
00306 
00307      ! For remaining unfinished particles, need to copy rest of walk_list (still not inspected)
00308      ! back onto defer list.
00309 
00310      do i=1,npshort
00311         ndef = ndefer(i)  ! # new deferrals added to defer_list during traversal
00312         nrest = nwalk(i)-defer_ctr(i) + 1  ! # unprocessed deferrals from previous fetch
00313         if (nrest>0) then  
00314            ! Augment defer list with rest of walk_list
00315            defer_list(ndef+1:ndef+nrest,i) = walk_list(defer_ctr(i):nwalk(i),i)
00316            ndefer(i) = ndefer(i) + nrest
00317         endif
00318         if (walk_last(i) /= 1) then
00319            defer_list(ndef+nrest+1,i) = walk_last(i)  ! Tack on key where local walk was interrupted
00320            ndefer(i) = ndefer(i) + 1
00321         endif
00322 
00323      end do
00324 
00325      call cputime(tw2)
00326      twalk=twalk+tw2-tw1
00327      !POMP$ INST END(walk_local)
00328 
00329 
00330      if (walk_debug) then
00331         write(ipefile,'(a/(o15,i7))') 'Shared defer list to be fetched: ',(fetch_key(i),htable( key2addr( fetch_key(i),'COWALK: defer' ) )%owner,i=1,nfetch_sum)
00332      endif
00333 
00334 
00335      ! At this point all particles have completed their walks with the locally available tree data.
00336      ! Each PE has list of nonlocal nodes which have been requested during these walks - fetch_key(1:nfetch_sum)
00337      ! Need to ship these requests to the PEs on which the child-data is actually held (cf particle swapping).
00338 
00339      ! First find out how many requests are to be sent to each PE 
00340  
00341 ! Create dummy keys to prevent zero length buffer in all2allv
00342   if (dummies) then
00343    do i=1,num_pe
00344      nfetch_sum=nfetch_sum+1 
00345      fetch_key(nfetch_sum)=0
00346      fetch_owner(nfetch_sum) = i-1
00347      nplace(i-1) = nplace(i-1)+1 
00348   enddo
00349 endif
00350 
00351      nfetches(0:num_pe-1) = (/ (count( mask = fetch_owner(1:nfetch_sum) == ipe ), ipe=0,num_pe-1) /)
00352 
00353      !POMP$ INST BEGIN(exchange)
00354 
00355      call MPI_BARRIER( MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr )   ! Wait for other PEs to catch up
00356 
00357 
00358      ! First exchange numbers of keys to be shipped and requested
00359 
00360      call MPI_ALLTOALL( nfetches, 1, MPI_INTEGER, nrequests, 1, MPI_INTEGER, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr )
00361 
00362 
00363      ! Derive strides needed for all2all
00364 
00365      sstrides = (/ 0, nfetches(0), ( SUM( nfetches(0:i-1) ),i=2,num_pe-1 ) /)
00366      rstrides = (/ 0, nrequests(0), ( SUM( nrequests(0:i-1) ),i=2,num_pe-1 ) /)
00367 
00368 
00369 
00370 
00371      ! Sort fetch_keys according to owner
00372      if (nfetch_sum>0) call indexsort(fetch_owner, indx, nfetch_sum, maxaddress)
00373 
00374      do i=1,nfetch_sum
00375         work_key(i)=fetch_key(indx(i))
00376         sort_owner(i)=fetch_owner(indx(i))
00377      end do
00378 
00379      if (walk_debug) then
00380         write (iofile,*) 'T',ntraversals,'N1, PE ',me,': # keys to fetch: ',nfetches(0:num_pe-1)
00381 !        write (iofile,*) 'PE ',me,': fetch strides: ',sstrides(0:num_pe-1)
00382 !        write(ipefile,'(a/(i5,i20))') 'unsorted: ',(fetch_owner(i),fetch_key(i),i=1,nfetch_sum) 
00383 !       write(iofile,'(a/(i5,o15))') 'sorted: ',(sort_owner(i),work_key(i),i=1,nfetch_sum) 
00384 !       write(iofile,*) 'sorted owners: ',(sort_owner(i),i=1,nfetch_sum) 
00385      endif
00386 
00387      ! Exchange key lists
00388 
00389      call MPI_ALLTOALLV( work_key,   nfetches, sstrides, MPI_INTEGER8, &
00390           request_key, nrequests, rstrides, MPI_INTEGER8, &
00391           MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr)
00392  
00393 !  Exchange owners
00394      do i=1,nfetch_sum
00395         fetch_owner(i)=me
00396      end do
00397 
00398      call MPI_ALLTOALLV( fetch_owner,   nfetches, sstrides, MPI_INTEGER, &
00399           request_owner, nrequests, rstrides, MPI_INTEGER, &
00400           MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr)
00401 
00402      nreqs_sum = SUM(nrequests)
00403 
00404      if (walk_debug) then
00405         call delay(me,ndelay)
00406         write (iofile,*) 'T',ntraversals,'N2, PE ',me,': # requested: ',nrequests(0:num_pe-1)
00407 !        write (iofile,*) 'PE ',me,': req strides: ',rstrides(0:num_pe-1)
00408 !        write(iofile,'(a/(2i5,o15))') 'requests ',(i,request_owner(i),request_key(i),i=1,nreqs_sum) 
00409 !        write(iofile,*) 'request owners',(request_owner(i),i=1,nreqs_sum) 
00410         call delay(me,ndelay)
00411 !        write(iofile,'(a2,i4,a7,i4,a/(2i5,o15))') 'T',ntraversals,'N2, PE ',me,'  request list ',(i,request_owner(i),request_key(i),i=1,nreqs_sum) 
00412      endif
00413 
00414      ! Now have complete list of requests from all PEs in rank order. 
00415      ! -- ready for all-to-all multipole swap
00416 
00417 
00418 !call cleanup
00419      ! Prepare send buffer: pack multipole info together.
00420 
00421      ship_count=0
00422      nchild_ship = 0              ! Total # local children to be shipped
00423 
00424      do i=1,nreqs_sum
00425 
00426 
00427      ! For each key in the request list, fetch and package tree info for children
00428         ship_address = key2addr(request_key(i),'CO-WALK: preship')  ! # address
00429         ship_node = htable(ship_address)%node
00430         ship_byte = htable( ship_address )%childcode   ! child byte code
00431         ship_leaves = htable( ship_address )%leaves                    ! # contained leaves
00432         ipe = request_owner(i)  ! who requested key
00433 
00434         nchild = SUM( (/ (ibits(ship_byte,j,1),j=0,7) /) )            ! Get # children from 1st 8 bits
00435         nchild_ship(ipe) = nchild_ship(ipe) + nchild  ! Total # children to be shipped back to this PE
00436 
00437         sub_key(1:nchild) = pack( bitarr, mask=(/ (btest(ship_byte,j),j=0,7) /) )      ! Extract sub key from byte code
00438         key_child(1:nchild) = IOR( ishft( request_key(i),3 ), sub_key(1:nchild) ) ! Construct keys of children
00439         addr_child(1:nchild) = (/( key2addr( key_child(j),'CO-WALK: ship child ' ),j=1,nchild)/)                 ! Table address of children
00440         node_child(1:nchild) = htable( addr_child(1:nchild) )%node                        ! Child node index  
00441         byte_child(1:nchild) = IAND( htable( addr_child(1:nchild) )%childcode,255 )        ! Catch lowest 8 bits of childbyte - filter off requested and here flags 
00442         leaves_child(1:nchild) = htable( addr_child(1:nchild) )%leaves                    ! # contained leaves
00443         next_child(1:nchild-1) = htable( addr_child(1:nchild-1) )%next                    ! # next-node pointer
00444         next_child(nchild) = -1                             ! Last child gets pointed back to _parent_ for non-local nodes
00445         ! This is used to distinguish particles' walks during 'defer' phase
00446 
00447         ! Package children properties into user-defined multipole array for shipping
00448 
00449         do ic = 1,nchild
00450            ship_count = ship_count+1
00451            pack_child(ship_count) = multipole ( key_child(ic), &
00452                 byte_child(ic), &
00453                 leaves_child(ic), &
00454                 me, &
00455                 next_child(ic), &
00456                 charge( node_child(ic) ), &
00457                 abs_charge( node_child(ic) ), &
00458                 xcoc( node_child(ic)), &
00459                 ycoc( node_child(ic)), &
00460                 zcoc( node_child(ic)), &
00461                 xdip( node_child(ic)), &
00462                 ydip( node_child(ic)), &
00463                 zdip( node_child(ic)), &
00464                 xxquad( node_child(ic)), &
00465                 yyquad( node_child(ic)), &
00466                 zzquad( node_child(ic)), &
00467                 xyquad( node_child(ic)), &
00468                 yzquad( node_child(ic)), &
00469                 zxquad( node_child(ic)), &
00470                 jx( node_child(ic)), &
00471                 jy( node_child(ic)), &
00472                 jz( node_child(ic)), &
00473                 magmx( node_child(ic)), &
00474                 magmy( node_child(ic)), &
00475                 magmz( node_child(ic)) )
00476 
00477         end do
00478 
00479         !  Keep record of requested child keys - exclude dummy
00480         if (key_child(1) .ne. 0) then
00481           nreqs_total(ipe) = nreqs_total(ipe) + nchild  ! Cummulative total of # children shipped
00482           requested_keys(sum_ships+1:sum_ships+nchild) = key_child(1:nchild)  ! Keep record of multipole ships
00483           requested_owner(sum_ships+1:sum_ships+nchild) = ipe  ! where requests came from
00484           sum_ships = sum_ships + nchild
00485         endif
00486 
00487         if (walk_debug) then
00488            write(ipefile,'(a,i4,i7/(o12,i15))') 'Keys requested from: ',ipe,nchild,(key_child(j),next_child(j),j=1,nchild) 
00489         endif
00490 
00491      end do
00492 
00493      ! Determine strides for # child nodes
00494      ! First exchange numbers of children to be shipped back
00495 
00496 
00497      ! Derive strides needed for all2all
00498      ! nplace(ipe) = # new nodes to be received
00499      ! nchild_ship(ipe) = Total # children shipped back
00500  
00501      sstrides = (/ 0, nchild_ship(0), ( SUM( nchild_ship(0:i-1) ),i=2,num_pe-1 ) /)
00502      rstrides = (/ 0, nplace(0), ( SUM( nplace(0:i-1) ),i=2,num_pe-1 ) /)
00503 
00504      if (walk_debug) then
00505         call delay(me,ndelay)
00506         write (iofile,*) 'T',ntraversals,'N4, PE ',me,': # children to insert:  ',nplace(0:num_pe-1)
00507         call delay(me,ndelay)
00508         write (iofile,*) 'T',ntraversals,'N3, PE ',me,': # children to ship back: ',nchild_ship(0:num_pe-1)
00509      endif
00510 
00511      nplace_sum = SUM(nplace)
00512      nchild_ship_sum = SUM(nchild_ship)
00513 
00514 
00515      ! Ship multipole data of children
00516 
00517      call MPI_ALLTOALLV( pack_child,   nchild_ship, sstrides, MPI_TYPE_MULTIPOLE, &
00518           get_child, nplace, rstrides, MPI_TYPE_MULTIPOLE, &
00519           MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr)
00520 
00521 ! if (ntraversals==2) call cleanup
00522      ! Make new hash entries with newly-fetched nodes
00523      newleaf = 0
00524      newtwig = 0
00525 
00526 
00527      do i=1, nplace_sum
00528         ipe = get_child(i)%owner  
00529         fetch_owner(i) = ipe
00530         recv_key = get_child(i)%key
00531         recv_parent = ishft( recv_key,-3 )
00532         recv_byte = get_child(i)%byte
00533         recv_leaves = get_child(i)%leaves
00534         recv_next = get_child(i)%next
00535 
00536         if (recv_leaves ==1 ) then
00537            newleaf = newleaf + 1
00538            nleaf = nleaf + 1
00539            nodchild = nleaf
00540            n_children(nodchild) = 0
00541            first_child(nodchild) = recv_key
00542 
00543         else if (recv_leaves > 1) then
00544            newtwig = newtwig + 1
00545            ntwig = ntwig + 1
00546            nodchild =  -ntwig
00547            nchild = SUM( (/ (ibits(recv_byte,j,1),j=0,7) /) )   ! Get # children
00548            n_children( nodchild ) = nchild       
00549            sub_key(1:nchild) = pack( bitarr(0:7), mask=(/ (btest(recv_byte,j),j=0,7) /) )  ! Extract child sub-keys from byte code
00550            first_child( nodchild ) = IOR( ishft( recv_key,3), sub_key(1) )              ! Construct key of 1st (grand)child
00551 
00552         else
00553            write(*,'(a,i5,a,i5)') 'LPEPC | WALK-CO on ',me,' Bad twig received from PE ',ipe
00554            write(*,'(a,o25)') '# leaves <=0 for received child node ',recv_key
00555            write(*,'(a,2i10)') 'recv count, i ',recv_count,i
00556            write(*,'(a,i10)') '# leaves ',recv_leaves
00557            write(*,*) get_child(recv_count)
00558            !           write(*,'(a,i5)') 'LPEPC | ... key will be ignored' 
00559 !           call cleanup  ! Abort
00560         endif
00561 
00562         ! Insert new node into local #-table
00563 
00564         call make_hashentry( recv_key, nodchild, recv_leaves, recv_byte, ipe, hashaddr, ierr )
00565 
00566         htable(hashaddr)%next = recv_next           ! Fill in special next-node pointer for non-local children
00567         node_addr =  key2addr( recv_parent,'CO-WALK: MNHE ')
00568         htable( node_addr )%childcode = IBSET(  htable( node_addr )%childcode, 9) ! Set children_HERE flag for parent node
00569 
00570         node_level( nodchild ) = log(1.*recv_key)/log(8.)  ! get level from keys and prestore as node property
00571 
00572         ! Store physical properties
00573 
00574         charge( nodchild ) = get_child(i)%q
00575         abs_charge( nodchild ) = get_child(i)%absq
00576         xcoc( nodchild ) = get_child(i)%xcoc
00577         ycoc( nodchild ) = get_child(i)%ycoc
00578         zcoc( nodchild ) = get_child(i)%zcoc
00579         xdip( nodchild ) = get_child(i)%xdip
00580         ydip( nodchild ) = get_child(i)%ydip
00581         zdip( nodchild ) = get_child(i)%zdip
00582 
00583         xxquad( nodchild ) = get_child(i)%xxquad
00584         yyquad( nodchild ) = get_child(i)%yyquad
00585         zzquad( nodchild ) = get_child(i)%zzquad
00586         xyquad( nodchild ) = get_child(i)%xyquad
00587         yzquad( nodchild ) = get_child(i)%yzquad
00588         zxquad( nodchild ) = get_child(i)%zxquad
00589 
00590         jx( nodchild ) = get_child(i)%jx
00591         jy( nodchild ) = get_child(i)%jy
00592         jz( nodchild ) = get_child(i)%jz
00593 
00594         magmx( nodchild ) = get_child(i)%magmx
00595         magmy( nodchild ) = get_child(i)%magmy
00596         magmz( nodchild ) = get_child(i)%magmz
00597 
00598         ! Put last child onto list for post-traversal processing
00599         if (recv_next == -1) then
00600            nlast_child = nlast_child + 1
00601            last_child(nlast_child) = recv_key
00602         endif
00603 
00604         ! Bookkeeping
00605         nfetch_total(ipe)=nfetch_total(ipe)+1
00606         sum_fetches=sum_fetches+1  ! Total fetches for iteration
00607         fetched_keys(sum_fetches) = recv_key
00608         if (walk_debug) write(ipefile,'(a6,i6,o15,a6,i7,a9,o15,a6,i15)') &
00609              'Walk: ',sum_fetches,recv_key,' from ',ipe,' parent ',recv_parent,' next ',recv_next
00610      end do
00611 
00612 
00613    ! Copy defer lists to new walk lists for next tree-walk iteration
00614      nlist = 0
00615      do i=1,npshort
00616         nwalk(i) = ndefer(i)   ! # deferrals still to process
00617         if (nwalk(i) /= 0) then
00618            nlist = nlist + 1
00619            walk_list( 1:nwalk(i), i ) = defer_list( 1:nwalk(i), i )  ! Walk list to inspect
00620            walk_list( nwalk(i)+1, i ) = 1        ! Last node root for correct 'next-node'
00621            walk_key(nlist) = walk_list(1, i)       ! Start node for next walk
00622            plist(nlist) = i                        ! Particle index
00623            defer_ctr(i) = 1                        ! Deferral counter (1 ... nwalk)
00624         endif
00625      enddo
00626 
00627      nactive = count( mask = nwalk(1:npshort) /= 0 )     ! Count remaining 'active' particles - those still with deferred nodes to search
00628 
00629 
00630      ! Broadcast # remaining particles to other PEs
00631 
00632      call MPI_ALLGATHER( nactive, 1, MPI_INTEGER, nactives, 1, MPI_INTEGER, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr )
00633 
00634      maxactive = maxval(nactives)
00635 
00636 !     sum_fetches = sum_fetches + nplace_sum  ! Total # fetches/iteration
00637 !     sum_ships = sum_ships + nchild_ship_sum ! Total # shipments/iteration
00638 
00639      if (walk_summary ) then
00640         write (ipefile,'(/a,i8,a2)') 'LPEPC | Summary for traversal # ',ntraversals,' :'
00641         ! Determine global max
00642         call MPI_ALLREDUCE( nplace_sum, max_nplace, 1, MPI_INTEGER, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr )
00643         write (ipefile,'(a40,i8,a7,i8,a12,i8)') ' # inner loop iterations: ', inner_pass,', sum: ',sum_inner_pass,' previous ave: ',sum_inner_old
00644         write (ipefile,'(a40,i8,a7,i8,a12,i8)') ' # tree hops in inner loop: ',nhops,', sum: ',sum_nhops,' previous: ',sum_nhops_old
00645         write (ipefile,*) ' # local children shipped:     ',nchild_ship,', traversal sum:',nchild_ship_sum
00646         write (ipefile,*) ' # non-local children fetched: ',nplace,', traversal sum:',nplace_sum
00647         write (ipefile,*) ' cumulative # requested keys:  ',nreqs_total
00648         write (ipefile,*) ' cumulative # fetched keys:    ',nfetch_total
00649 
00650         write (ipefile,*) 'array limit',size_fetch
00651 
00652         write (ipefile,'(3(/a30,i6)/a/(2i5))') &
00653              'New twigs: ',newtwig, &
00654              'New leaves:',newleaf, &
00655              'New list length: ',nlist, &
00656              '# remaining active particles on each PE: ',SUM(nactives),MAXVAL(nactives)
00657         !           '# remaining active particles on each CPU: ',(i,nactives(i+1),i=0,num_pe-1)
00658         !        write(ipefile,'(a/(2i5))') 'New shortlist: ',(plist(i),pshort(plist(i)),i=1,nlist)
00659 
00660      endif
00661 
00662      ! Array bound checks
00663      if (nleaf>.95*maxleaf .and. mod(me,100).eq.0) then
00664         write (6,*) 'LPEPC | WARNING: tree arrays >95% full on CPU ',me
00665         write (6,*) 'LPEPC | nleaf = ',nleaf,' / ',maxleaf
00666 !        call cleanup
00667      endif
00668      if (ntwig>.95*maxtwig .and. mod(me,100).eq.0) then
00669         write (6,*) 'LPEPC | WARNING: tree arrays >95% full on CPU ',me
00670         write (6,*) 'LPEPC | ntwig = ',ntwig,' / ',maxtwig
00671 !        call cleanup
00672      endif
00673 
00674      call cputime(tc1)
00675      tfetch=tfetch+tc1-tw2  ! timing for 2nd half of walk
00676      !POMP$ INST END(exchange)
00677   end do
00678 
00679 
00680 
00681   !  Determine 'next_node' pointers for 'last child' list & update hash table (tree).
00682   !  This  ensures that traversals in next pass treat already-fetched nodes as local,
00683   !  avoiding deferral list completely.
00684 !   write(*,*) 'nlast_child = ',nlast_child
00685 
00686   do i = 1,nlast_child
00687      search_key = last_child(i)                   
00688      node_addr = key2addr(search_key,'CO-WALK: NN search ')
00689      htable( node_addr )%next = next_node(search_key)  !   Get next sibling, uncle, great-uncle in local tree
00690 !  if (walk_debug) then
00691 !       write(ipefile,'(a,o15,a4,o15)') 'Changed next node for ',search_key,' to ',htable(node_addr)%next
00692 !  endif
00693   end do
00694 
00695   sum_inner_old = sum_inner_pass
00696 !  call MPI_ALLREDUCE( sum_nhops, sum_nhops_old, 1, MPI_INTEGER, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr )
00697 !  call MPI_ALLREDUCE( sum_inner_pass, sum_inner_old, 1, MPI_INTEGER, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr )
00698   sum_nhops_old = sum_nhops_old/num_pe
00699   sum_inner_old = sum_inner_old/num_pe
00700   maxtraverse = max(maxtraverse,ntraversals)
00701 
00702 end subroutine tree_walkc
00703 
00704 subroutine delay(me,ndelay)
00705 real :: dum=0.
00706 integer :: i
00707 integer :: ndelay,me
00708   do i=1,ndelay
00709      dum=dum+sqrt(1.*i)  
00710   end do
00711 ! if (me==0) write(*,'(/a/)') '-----------'
00712   do i=1,ndelay
00713      dum=dum+sqrt(1.*i)  
00714   end do
00715 return
00716 end subroutine delay
00717
